question: Salaams Can you please supply me with a dua that will make me steadfast in performing salaat.
answer:
QUESTION

I have been for Haj but don't perform the daily salaat.Plse make dua for me that Allah guides me on the right path. Jazakallah

ANSWER


Share:

You require more will power than reciting a Du'aa.

I haven't come across any specific Du'aas for this. You may recite the Du'aa
of Ibraahim (Alayhis salaam) as follows, 'Rabbij 'alniy muqeemas salaat'.
Also ask Allah to make you steadfast on the performance of this obligation.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



FATWA DEPT.
